description:
Perfect for ski touring! Our BERRINO JACKET for men is all about comfort and performance for pleasurable days of ski touring.

Thanks to Tasmanian merino wool on the inside, this athletic-cut jacket offers lightweight insulation and is a pleasure to wear. The outer of this lightweight softshell jacket offers scuff resistance and protection against wind and weather. Its elastic two-way stretch material with 11% wool enables it to mirror your every move. When it comes to high-quality features, we’ve focused on the essentials, such as spacious pockets exactly where you need them, and elastic waistband and cuffs with covered thumb loops.

All of this makes the puristic-looking BERRINO JACKET for men a reliable all-round companion for pleasurable ski touring days.
name: Ortovox Berrino Hooded Jacket - Mens
